article.article:
The Echo Dot is the best-selling speaker in history, says Amazon. The Echo Dot generation 3 is the best-sounding Echo Dot so far, says Amazon.

Well, both those statements may well be true - but being the best-sounding Echo Dot is very much like winning a "sweetest lemon" contest. And being the best-selling speaker in history is a little less impressive when you know many use their Echo Dot for things it does that doesn’t involve being a speaker, such as an egg timer.

But now that Black Friday, Amazon’s annual festival of consumption is upon us again, Echo Dot 3 can temporarily be yours for just £25. At that sort of money, this voice assistant/portal into a world of smart home control/loudspeaker can’t help but make a case for itself.
article.title: Amazon Echo Dot review: great smarts, but a so-so speaker
